cms.emailtemplate.EmailTemplateDisplayName: E-commerce - Order status notification to customer

Status of your order has changed.

The status of your order has changed to '{% Order.OrderStatus.DisplayName|(encode)true |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)4dc393861c0a4bfd76f702d2e885e13c6ac1ae5ae1dcf9190c3e31635fc63337%}'.
